item.title: Opting out of haveibeenpwned
item.description: Data breaches are a concern for anyone trying to live a life of relative privacy. Last month, PowerSchool informed its customers that hackers stole data of 62 million students. Unless you have been practicing Extreme Privacy techniques for decades, you likely have been impacted by at least one data breach.

item.title: Watching YouTube in private
item.description: I recently stumbled upon yewtu.be and found it intriguing. It not only allows you to watch YouTube without being on YouTube, but it also allows you to create an account and subscribe to channels without a Google account. What sort of wizardry is going on under the hood? It turns out that it’s a hosted instance of invidious.
